metadata.title: Validity and reliability of the proposed core competency for infection control nurses of hospitals in Hong Kong Chan et al. e13

abstract.original_text: Literature review and the Delphi approach were used to draft the core competency items of hospital infection control nurses in Hong Kong. Content validity, internal consistency, and test-retest reliability of the proposed core competency were ensured. The result serves as the foundation of developing training and assessment tools for infection control nurses in Hong Kong.
